CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

INV enters the room , then INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 09:35:42
INV clears the table of the toys from Small Scale Activity . INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the slinky toy to keep

INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . CHI plays with the slinky briefly and then drops it on the floor . MOT takes CHI out of the chair and puts him on the floor . INV picks up the slinky and the other toys . MOT and CHI walk over to the desk
